org.codice.ddf.admin.application.service

Interface ApplicationStatus

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationStatusImpl

    public interface ApplicationStatus
    Class that describes the status of an application. If application has errored out, it shows which components of the application did not start correctly.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ApplicationStatus.ApplicationState
      State describing the Application.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Application getApplication()
      Application this status is for.
      Set<org.osgi.framework.Bundle> getErrorBundles()
      Gets the bundles for this application that are not properly installed.
      Set<org.apache.karaf.features.Feature> getErrorFeatures()
      Gets the features for this application that are not properly installed.
      ApplicationStatus.ApplicationState getState()
      Retrieves the state of the current application.

    • Method Detail

      • getApplication

        Application getApplication()
        Application this status is for.
        Returns:
        The application associated to this status.

      • getState

        ApplicationStatus.ApplicationState getState()
        Retrieves the state of the current application.
        Returns:
        ApplicationStatus.ApplicationState for the current application

      • getErrorFeatures

        Set<org.apache.karaf.features.Feature> getErrorFeatures()
        Gets the features for this application that are not properly installed.
        Returns:
        Set of features that did not install.

      • getErrorBundles

        Set<org.osgi.framework.Bundle> getErrorBundles()
        Gets the bundles for this application that are not properly installed.
        Returns:
        Set of bundles that did not install.
